markdownRemark.html:
You are conducting a western blot detecting the upregulation of peroxiredoxin (PRDX) under certain conditions. Below is the dataset of the intensity of 5 control samples and 5 treated samples. You need to find the mean ratio of PRDX up regulation in treated samples compared to control samples. Remember to include the housekeeper gene as a control! The housekeeper expression is the last row of the dataset, 

Download the dataset
